archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.3.6d: d) develop use cases that describe threat-based scenarios the SOC should look for, specifying the baseline behaviour of relevant systems, the conditions in which certain events may signal abnormal activity and details for the technical implementation of the use case (e.g. data sources and correlation logic)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
